survey_name: Electric Vehicle Charging Infrastructure Satisfaction Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate user satisfaction with existing electric vehicle (EV) charging infrastructure, identifying pain points and areas for improvement to enhance the EV ownership experience.

questions.question_text: How often do you use public EV charging stations?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for mobile-friendliness. Consider randomizing options to reduce bias.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: radio button (SINGLE_CHOICE). Ensure options are vertically aligned.

script.question_text: How often do you use public EV charging stations?

questions.question_text: What types of public EV charging stations do you typically use? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Multi-select checkbox format. Include an 'Other' option with open-text field.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (MULTI_CHOICE) with optional text input for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What types of public EV charging stations do you typically use? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the availability of public EV charging stations in your area?
questions.client_notes: 5-point Likert scale. Label all points for clarity.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: radio button (SINGLE_CHOICE). Horizontal layout if space allows.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the availability of public EV charging stations in your area?

questions.question_text: What is the primary reason you don't use public EV charging stations?
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option with open-text field to capture unique responses.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: radio button (SINGLE_CHOICE) with optional text input for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What is the primary reason you don't use public EV charging stations?

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the reliability of public EV charging stations (i.e., stations working when you need them)?
questions.client_notes: 5-point Likert scale. Consider adding a 'Not applicable' option if needed.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the reliability of public EV charging stations (i.e., stations working when you need them)?

questions.question_text: What payment methods do you prefer for public EV charging? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Multi-select checkbox format. Include an 'Other' option with open-text field.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (MULTI_CHOICE) with optional text input for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What payment methods do you prefer for public EV charging? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How often do you encounter occupied or out-of-service charging stations?
answer_options: Very frequently (more than 50% of the time)
questions.client_notes: Single-choice question with ordered response options.

script.question_text: How often do you encounter occupied or out-of-service charging stations?
answer_options: Very frequently (more than 50% of the time)

questions.question_text: What improvements would most encourage you to use public EV charging stations more often? (Select up to 3)
questions.client_notes: Multi-select with limit of 3 choices. Include an 'Other' option with open-text field.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (MULTI_CHOICE) with max_selections=3 and optional text input for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What improvements would most encourage you to use public EV charging stations more often? (Select up to 3)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the speed of charging at public stations?
questions.client_notes: 5-point Likert scale. Consider adding a 'Depends on station type' option.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the speed of charging at public stations?

questions.question_text: What additional features would you like to see at EV charging stations? (e.g., restrooms, Wi-Fi, etc.)
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback. Use a text area with 3-5 line display.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: open text (OPEN_TEXT) with multi-line input.

script.question_text: What additional features would you like to see at EV charging stations? (e.g., restrooms, Wi-Fi, etc.)
